div.p: J.E. designed and coordinated the study and led the writing. V.W., J.-H.K., L.B., S.S., and J.S.S.D. were responsible for the GDGT data acquisition. G.S. and D.S. analyzed the observation-based reanalysis data and model simulations. H.G. estimated the ice shelf melting. J.E., J.-H.K., X.C., G.S., J.C., H.G., M.N-H., and D.S. were in charge of the majority of the data interpretation. All authors commented on the manuscript and contributed to the writing.
